DOC.criteria: Stage 1 ( Healthy Volunteers ) Male female 20 75 year age , inclusive , weigh 50 80 kg body mass index ( BMI ) less 30 kg/m^2 . In good health determine medical psychiatric history , physical examination , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , serum chemistry , hematology , urinalysis , serology . Other criterion apply , please contact investigator information Stage 2 ( Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease ( COPD ) patient ) Male female ; 40 75 year age , inclusive minimum body weight 40 kg Current former cigarette smoker history cigarette smoke ≥10 pack year screen visit Diagnosis COPD define Global Initiative Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease guideline . Other criterion apply , please contact investigator information Stage 1 ( Healthy Volunteers ) History current evidence clinically significant uncontrolled disease Any disorder may interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion study drug . History severe allergy milk protein Active smoker former smoker quit within 3 month first dose study drug . Former smoker great fivepack year ( ie , equivalent one pack per day five year ) also exclude . Other criterion apply , please contact investigator information Stage 2 ( Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease ( COPD ) patient ) Recent history hospitalization due exacerbation airway disease within 3 month Need increase treatment COPD within 6 week prior screen visit History and/or current diagnosis asthma Known α1 antitrypsin deficiency , active lung infection ( tuberculosis pneumonia ) , lung cancer absolute exclusionary condition Other criterion apply , please contact investigator information
